song.title: Flame Repellent
song.info:
Yup. I wanted to see what all the fuss was about, so I downloaded Famitracker, and spent this week working on this short groove using the Konami VRC6 chip. It's my first completed tune using Famitracker, and it's nowhere near as good as my other songs, so after you listen to this, go listen to them instead.
[url=http://8bc.org/items/music/Flamerepellent.mp3]Download MP3 (128 kbps)[/url] [url=http://2a03.free.fr/dl.php?file=2785]Download FTM[/url] [url=http://famitracker.shoodot.net/downloads.php]Download Famitracker (Windows)[/url]
